name: Reel Scripts RAG - Supabase + Postgres + OpenAi

parameters.content:
# Trigger: Facebook Ads Google Drive - New Files Added
## Files created in RAG Datastore / Facebook Ads -> Check file type and do conversion if necessary -> Extract the text -> Add to Vector Store
RAG Datastore / Facebook Ads

# Trigger: Facebook Ads Google Drive - Files Updated
## Files updated in a specific folder -> Check file type and do conversion if necessary -> Extract the text -> Add to Vector Store
Drive/Backoffice/Backoffice_Contracts

values.content:
Your goal is to take the incoming version number and add 1 to it. 

[Examples]
Input: v1
Output: v2

Input: v2
Output: v3

Input: v4
Output: v5 

The output field should always be called "version"

parameters.name: reelscripts
parameters.description: This tool retrieves Facebook Reel scripts, tips, and strategies stored in a vector database. It is useful for answering questions about creating, optimizing, and understanding short-form video scripts. Use this tool to get clear, actionable insights on crafting high-performing Reels, including script ideas, hooks, engagement strategies, and video structure. Input must be a fully formed question to retrieve the most relevant information.
